wiki.summary: "Trivia 起: Just Dance" is a song by j-hope of BTS. It was released on August 24, 2018, and appears as the second track of CD A in their second compilation album Love Yourself: Answer. "Trivia 起: Just Dance" by j-hope of BTS is a song about the joy that comes with dancing with someone you care about. The lyrics describe the feeling of letting go of your worries and embracing the moment with the one you love. J-Hope sings about the sensations of dancing in the sun and feeling the rhythm of the music take over his body. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "Trivia 起: Just Dance" is a song by j-hope of BTS. It was released on August 24, 2018, and appears as the second track of CD A in their second compilation album Love Yourself: Answer. "Trivia 起: Just Dance" by j-hope of BTS is a song about the joy that comes with dancing with someone you care about. The lyrics describe the feeling of letting go of your worries and embracing the moment with the one you love. J-Hope sings about the sensations of dancing in the sun and feeling the rhythm of the music take over his body. He expresses the desire to dance freely with his partner and to have a genuine conversation with them. The song celebrates the power of dance to bring people together and create a sense of unity. It also speaks to the idea that dancing can help people connect on a deeper level, as they learn more about each other through movement. At its core, "Trivia 起: Just Dance" is a joyful ode to the power of dance and the bond it can create between people. Read more on Last.fm.
